pc.pc: for an item sets a higher price per item as defined by your supplier.
For example, you may need to split a pack, box, or roll, or you may have negotiated a discounted price that only applies when you purchase a specific quantity or more.
If you purchase less than that trade split quantity, you need to pay the split price.

pc.pc: Drag the dial or click the numbered icons to reveal the information.

The simPRO CDB, Central DataBase, provides staff with access to client and internal simPRO Builds for testing, reviewing issues and previewing new features, this system is managed and updated by the customisation team.
Those in IC, Support, Product, L&D, and Admin roles have access to the CDB.
Asana is used by many different teams to manage large projects and tasks.
Keep tabs on progress and targets to make sure deadlines are met on time and everyone is able to track their part in completing the project. Also allows teams to collaborate seamlessly.
JIRA is used to record and manage issues found in the simPRO Software and the development of fixes for those issues.
Those in QA, Development, Product, L&D, Technical Support and Customisations all have access to Confluence. Support agents have the ability to create JIRA tickets using Salesforce.
Confluence is used to record and manage simPRO’s releases, feature requirements and products’ ongoing roadmap for future improvements.
Those in QA, Development, Product, L&D, Technical Support and Customisations all have access to Confluence.
Salesforce is used to manage client interactions, sales opportunities, client licences and cases.
Salesforce is managed and updated by the IT& Systems Team. Those in Admin, Sales, Support, L&D, and IC roles all have access to Salesforce.

pc.pc: At simPRO, we hand out devices to our staff and the responsibility that goes with them. You are the System Administrator for your own devices.
As part of this responsibility, there are a few rules to be aware of.
Drag the slider to learn about the rules.

If anything suspicious or out of the ordinary occurs with any of your simPRO accounts please report it as soon as possible. It is preferred to investigate all concerns and avoid potentially major issues.
For example, if you receive an odd email from a staff member you weren’t expecting, do not open it and report it as soon as possible.
Additionally if you login to your email and and notice that emails are read or missing, report the activity as soon as possible.
If you are ever unsure about something please don’t hesitate to ask someone.
If any of your devices break or have issues, they will be reset back to factory defaults, losing all stored data in the process.
Please keep all important documents and files stored on
Don’t install any new antivirus software.
download or store illicit material on corporate equipment.
Don’t bring them into our offices. For example, pirated movies, music, images etc.
perform any changes to the IT environment without permission.
For example don’t adjust the printers, routers, cabling, meeting room devices. If you think a device can be configured better, please speak with the IT team.
leave your accounts active and logged in on devices which are unattended.
For example an unlocked computer, mobile or tablet.
leave your passwords unprotected and visible.
For example, do not leave your password written down on your desk.

pc.pc: Assessing sites to determine how much installing products will generally cost
Calculating costs accurately based on a broad range of factors such as fit times, complex institutions and specific site requirements.
simPRO gives estimators the ability to account for these varying factors and calculate costs accurately.
Build take off templates to make the creation of new quote easier and more consistent.

pc.pc: Keep track of products and services their company provides
simPRO makes it easy for salespeople to track customers, potential leads, and view up-to-date catalogues so that pricing is accurate.

pc.pc: Extensive material management functionality allows store people to check exactly which parts are required on which jobs, when they’ve been ordered and received.
Easily check what technicians are using on their jobs and whether their stock levels are correct.

pc.pc: Data entry and maintaining accurate information
Ensuring they have the relevant resources to complete a job
simPRO Mobile gives technicians a detailed breakdown of their work including any site history, customer details, asset testing and stock management.
Makes it easier to ensure they have the correct information at all times.
Allows technicians to input information quickly and easily while in the field.

pc.pc: Ensuring that the financials all add up
Following up with customers so that invoices are paid on time
Although simPRO is not an accounting package, it allows users to generate invoices, payments and other transactions that can then be posted over to another piece of software.
Allows an accounts person to track costs to ensure their accounts are accurate.

pc.pc: Ensuring technicians attend work when they’re required
Scheduling any plant and equipment that the company might manage
Liaising with contractors to ensure that they attend jobs where required
Scheduling efficiently based on the geographic location of technicians and sites
Ensuring the correctly qualified technician is scheduled to a job
simPRO and it’s addons allow a schedule to monitor technicians, identify who is available, who is qualified and who might be closest to a particular job.

pc.pc: Managing the operations of the business on a ground level
Filling gaps in other office based roles
Ensuring that other roles in the business are performing what’s required of them when they’re needed
simPRO gives the office manager the ability to communicate with and manage employees efficiently and easily.

pc.pc: Overall financial success of the business
Analyse where the business is succeeding and where it might be failing
Keep the business on course and watchout for significant changes in their industry
Analyse the operation of the business and accurately see what is working
Extensive reporting features enables the business owner to accurately see what areas of the business are succeeding and what areas require improvement.

pc.pc: Create and use tasks to keep an interactive to-do list for your jobs. Your customers can view the details of their tasks, if they are using the customer portal with the Tasks menu enabled.

Task templates in a job enables you to quickly create multiple tasks that are frequently carried out. If a task is particularly complex, you may create a follow-up note as a reminder for activities or actions.

The customer has chosen to proceed with a competitor.
The salesperson needs to send photos of recommended products to the customer.

Fleet management software monitors and records the exact location of your fleet in real time as well as driver behaviour, such as speeding and idling. It also helps you plan and track your vehicle maintenance.
Manage your preventative asset maintenance including multiple service levels, failure points, recommendations, rectification quotes and reporting.
This integrated solution ensures you obtain useful data from emails and attached documents. Save time on manual entry by automatically generating new workflows in your simPRO build.

pc.pc: Drag and drop the integration to their respective description.
Easily add emails as notes to customers, leads , quotes and jobs, without needing to leave the Gmail screen.
A third party tax calculation system for those operating in the US, to easily calculate tax on quotes, jobs, recurring jobs and recurring invoices.
A popular online point of sale system that makes collecting payment in the field easier. Use simPRO Mobile to invoice and collect payment in the field.
If you have a Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) provider, you can integrate simPRO with your VoIP service to make and receive phone calls in simPRO.
The correct answers are shown in green.
